The Advata Advantage

Advata is the quickest way to build lists and close more deals. With our Chrome Extension, all it takes is one click to get accurate prospect information, which can be built into powerful lists and exported with ease in our web app.

We scrap through social mediums and public data to provide the most up to date and accurate job titles, phone numbers, emails and more to make your prospecting quick and efficient.

We want to empower our users to generate and customize their own lists with ease. Less hassle and more sales. Advata makes list building a snap.
